completion:
thought: The user wants me to click the button with the text 'Login'. I will find its selector and perform a click action.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Login')")

prompt: Please click the button labeled 'Submit Form'.
completion:
thought: I need to find a button with the text 'Submit Form' and click on it.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Submit Form')")

prompt: Find the 'Cancel' button and click it.
completion:
thought: The goal is to click the 'Cancel' button. I should locate it first.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Cancel')")

thought: The user wants to input text into an email field. I will look for an input with a type 'email' or a name related to 'email'.
action: TYPE(selector="input[type='email']", text="john.doe@email.com")

thought: I need to type 'testuser' into the input field for usernames. I'll search for an input with id or name as 'username'.
action: TYPE(selector="input[name='username']", text="testuser")

thought: The instruction is to fill the password field. I will find the input field of type 'password' and type the provided text.
action: TYPE(selector="input[type='password']", text="a_secure_password_123")

thought: I need to find and click on a red square element. I'll look for an element with red background color.
action: CLICK(selector="[style*='background-color: red'], [style*='background: red'], .red-square")

prompt: Select the option 'Option 2' from the dropdown.
completion:
thought: I need to select an option from a dropdown menu. I'll find the select element and choose 'Option 2'.
action: SELECT(selector="select", value="Option 2")

prompt: Check the checkbox labeled 'I agree to terms'.
completion:
thought: I need to check a checkbox with the text 'I agree to terms'. I'll find it and check it.
action: CHECK(selector="input[type='checkbox'] + label:contains('I agree to terms'), input[type='checkbox'][id*='agree'], input[type='checkbox'][name*='terms']")

thought: I need to click on a tab labeled 'Home' to navigate to it.
action: CLICK(selector="[role='tab']:contains('Home'), .tab:contains('Home'), a:contains('Home')")

prompt: Fill in the first name field with 'Alice'.
completion:
thought: I need to enter 'Alice' into a first name input field.
action: TYPE(selector="input[name*='first'], input[id*='first'], input[placeholder*='first' i]", text="Alice")

prompt: Fill in the last name field with 'Johnson'.
completion:
thought: I need to enter 'Johnson' into a last name input field.
action: TYPE(selector="input[name*='last'], input[id*='last'], input[placeholder*='last' i]", text="Johnson")

thought: I need to find and click a button with the text 'Save'.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Save'), input[type='submit'][value*='Save']")

thought: I need to find and click a delete button or option for the selected item.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Delete'), .delete-btn, [title*='Delete'], .trash-icon")

prompt: Search for 'machine learning' in the search box.
completion:
thought: I need to find a search input and type 'machine learning' into it.
action: TYPE(selector="input[type='search'], input[name*='search'], input[placeholder*='search' i], .search-input", text="machine learning")

thought: I need to find and click a button labeled 'Next' to move forward.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Next'), .next-btn, [title*='Next']")

prompt: Go back to the previous page.
completion:
thought: I need to find and click a back button or previous page link.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Back'), .back-btn, [title*='Back'], .previous-btn")

thought: I need to find and click on a settings menu or button.
action: CLICK(selector="[title*='Settings'], .settings-btn, button:contains('Settings'), .gear-icon")

thought: I need to find and click a close button on a dialog or modal.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Close'), .close-btn, .modal-close, [aria-label*='close' i]")

prompt: Select all items in the list.
completion:
thought: I need to find and check a 'select all' checkbox or button.
action: CHECK(selector="input[type='checkbox'][id*='select-all'], input[type='checkbox'][name*='select-all'], .select-all-checkbox")

prompt: Upload a file by clicking the upload button.
completion:
thought: I need to find and click a file upload button.
action: CLICK(selector="input[type='file'], .upload-btn, button:contains('Upload'), [title*='Upload']")

thought: I need to find and click a refresh or reload button.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Refresh'), .refresh-btn, [title*='Refresh'], .reload-btn")

thought: I need to find and click on a collapsible section to expand it.
action: CLICK(selector="[aria-expanded='false'], .collapsed, .expand-btn, [title*='Expand']")

thought: I need to find and click a minimize button.
action: CLICK(selector=".minimize-btn, [title*='Minimize'], button:contains('Minimize')")

prompt: Change the view to list mode.
completion:
thought: I need to find and click a button to switch to list view.
action: CLICK(selector=".list-view-btn, button:contains('List'), [title*='List View']")

thought: I need to find and click a button to switch to grid view.
action: CLICK(selector=".grid-view-btn, button:contains('Grid'), [title*='Grid View']")

thought: I need to find and click a sort button or header for name sorting.
action: CLICK(selector="th:contains('Name'), .sort-name, [data-sort='name']")

thought: I need to find a filter option for 'Technology' category and select it.
action: CLICK(selector="option:contains('Technology'), .filter-technology, [value='Technology']")

thought: I need to find and click an 'Add to Cart' button.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Add to Cart'), .add-to-cart-btn, [title*='Add to Cart']")

thought: I need to find and click a button to remove from favorites.
action: CLICK(selector=".remove-favorite, button:contains('Remove'), [title*='Remove from favorites']")

thought: I need to find and click a button to mark something as read.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Mark as Read'), .mark-read-btn, [title*='Mark as Read']")

thought: I need to find and click a share button.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Share'), .share-btn, [title*='Share']")

thought: I need to find and click a print button.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Print'), .print-btn, [title*='Print']")

thought: I need to find and click a download button or link.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Download'), .download-btn, a[download], [title*='Download']")

thought: I need to find and click a copy link button.
action: CLICK(selector="button:contains('Copy'), .copy-link-btn, [title*='Copy Link']")

thought: I need to find a phone number input field and enter the specified number.
action: TYPE(selector="input[type='tel'], input[name*='phone'], input[placeholder*='phone' i]", text="555-123-4567")

thought: I need to find a date input and set it to the specified date.
action: TYPE(selector="input[type='date'], .date-picker input", text="2024-12-25")

thought: I need to find a zip code input field and enter the specified code.
action: TYPE(selector="input[name*='zip'], input[name*='postal'], input[placeholder*='zip' i]", text="90210")

thought: I need to find a quantity input field and set it to 3.
action: TYPE(selector="input[name*='quantity'], input[name*='qty'], .quantity-input", text="3")

thought: I need to find a company name input field and enter 'Acme Corp'.
action: TYPE(selector="input[name*='company'], input[placeholder*='company' i]", text="Acme Corp")

prompt: Fill in the message field with 'Hello, I need help with my order.'
completion:
thought: I need to find a message or comment text area and enter the specified text.
action: TYPE(selector="textarea[name*='message'], textarea[placeholder*='message' i], .message-input", text="Hello, I need help with my order.")

thought: I need to find an age input field and enter 25.
action: TYPE(selector="input[name*='age'], input[placeholder*='age' i]", text="25")

thought: I need to find a URL input field and enter the specified website URL.
action: TYPE(selector="input[type='url'], input[name*='website'], input[placeholder*='url' i]", text="https://example.com")

thought: I need to find a title or job title input field and enter the specified title.
action: TYPE(selector="input[name*='title'], input[placeholder*='title' i]", text="Software Engineer")

prompt: Fill in description: 'Experienced developer with 5+ years in web development.'
completion:
thought: I need to find a description text area and enter the specified description.
action: TYPE(selector="textarea[name*='description'], textarea[placeholder*='description' i], .description-input", text="Experienced developer with 5+ years in web development.")

thought: I need to find and select the 'Premium' option from a plan selection.
action: SELECT(selector="select[name*='plan'], .plan-selector", value="Premium")

thought: I need to select 'Monthly' from billing cycle options.
action: SELECT(selector="select[name*='billing'], .billing-cycle-selector", value="Monthly")

thought: I need to select 'United States' from a country dropdown.
action: SELECT(selector="select[name*='country'], .country-selector", value="United States")

thought: I need to select 'English' from a language dropdown.
action: SELECT(selector="select[name*='language'], .language-selector", value="English")

thought: I need to select 'Pacific Time' from a timezone dropdown.
action: SELECT(selector="select[name*='timezone'], .timezone-selector", value="Pacific Time")

thought: I need to find and check a newsletter subscription checkbox.
action: CHECK(selector="input[type='checkbox'][name*='newsletter'], input[type='checkbox'] + label:contains('Newsletter')")

thought: I need to find and uncheck the SMS notifications checkbox.
action: UNCHECK(selector="input[type='checkbox'][name*='sms'], input[type='checkbox'] + label:contains('SMS')")

thought: I need to find and click a dark mode toggle switch.
action: CLICK(selector=".dark-mode-toggle, input[type='checkbox'][name*='dark'], [role='switch'][aria-label*='dark' i]")

thought: I need to find and enable notifications setting.
action: CHECK(selector="input[type='checkbox'][name*='notification'], .notification-toggle")

thought: I need to find and disable the auto-save checkbox or toggle.
action: UNCHECK(selector="input[type='checkbox'][name*='auto-save'], .auto-save-toggle")
